path.style: fill: none; stroke: #ed2024; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10; stroke-width: 4px;
fill: none; stroke: #010101; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10; stroke-width: 4px;

line.style: fill: none; stroke: #000; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10; stroke-width: 4px;
